home_tiles.title: Safe, Friendly Environment
home_tiles.content: We believe gymnastics is a safe and nuturing sport, and from the moment you walk into our gymnasium you will see a safe, colourful, and exciting environment to learn gymnastics within.

home_tiles.title: Opportunities for all abilities
home_tiles.content: We believe everybody can do gymnastics, and offer a range of programmes and services for all ages and abilities.

home_tiles.title: Birthday Parties
home_tiles.content: Have an awesome, action-packed birthday party at HCG!

splash_subtitle: Harbour City GymSports is a Wellington based gymnastics provider, offering a wide range of specialised classes for all ages and abilities. We cater for athletes of all ages - from the preschooler child right through to adults
contact_subtitle: Send us your questions about what you're after, or express interest in a class.
